channel.title: Talk on Welcome to Open Weed Science
channel.description: Recent content in Talk on Welcome to Open Weed Science

item.title: Using RStudio for visualization and analysis of weed science
item.description: Symposia A RStudio symposia was conducted at the 74th North Central Weed Science Society (NCWSS) Meeting in Columbus, OH on December 11, 2019. Thanks to Ethann Barnes for putting together the RStudio symposia and NCWSS committee members for accepting our proposal. Talks Title: Basics of R and RStudio Presenter: Dr. Ethann R. Barnes, University of Nebraska-Lincoln Title: Data wrangling with dplyr Presenter: Dr. Maxwel C. Oliveira, University of Wisconsin-Madison Title: An introduction to using R for weed population dynamics modeling
